Class Hourglass

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.Miscellaneous.Hourglass
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Hourglass extends Object implements Serializable
The Hourglass class represents a countdown timer that decrements every second and allows actions to be executed upon completion using a callback method. The timer can be started, stopped, or reset as needed. This class is designed to support a simple timer mechanism with the following features: - Start a countdown timer for a predefined duration. - Perform a specific action (callback) when the countdown reaches zero. - Stop and reset the timer. Note: The class implements Serializable to support serialization, but the Timer instance is marked as transient since it cannot be serialized.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Hourglass

      public Hourglass(int remainingSeconds)
      Constructs a new Hourglass object with a specific countdown duration in seconds. The timer is initialized but remains inactive until explicitly started.
      Parameters:
      remainingSeconds - the number of seconds the countdown timer is set to run

  • Method Details

    • startTimer

      public void startTimer(Runnable callbackMethod)
      Starts the countdown timer if it is not active. The timer decrements the remaining seconds at a fixed interval and executes a callback method when the timer reaches zero.
      Parameters:
      callbackMethod - the action to be executed when the timer finishes. This method is invoked once the countdown completes.

    • stopTimer

      public void stopTimer()
      Stops the currently active countdown timer, if one is running. This method: - Cancels the existing Timer instance. - Resets the Timer to a new instance. - Sets the `active` flag to `false` to indicate the timer is no longer running. - Resets the `remainingSeconds` back to the initial timer duration. If the timer is not active, the method does nothing.

    • getRemainingSeconds

      public int getRemainingSeconds()
      Retrieves the number of seconds remaining in the countdown timer.
      Returns:
      the number of seconds left in the current countdown
